Title: Christmas: Soludo, Arewa community leader in Anambra sue for peace
Summary: In the spirit of Christmas, Anambra State Governor and leader of the Arewa Community in the State have called for peace among Nigerians .

Title: In Pictures: Nigerian celebrities celebrate Christmas with heartwarming family photos
Summary: Nigerian celebrities are back on social media this Christmas, sharing cosy family moments and festive photos with their fans . This year feels different from 2024. The quiet, minimalist looks are gone. In their place are bolder colours, playful styling and playful styling .

Title: FG deploys tactical teams as Shettima vows no mercy for terrorists
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has ordered the immediate deployment of additional tactical security teams to Borno State to track down and apprehend those responsible for the bomb explosion . Vice President Kashim Shettima vows no mercy for terrorists .

Title: NUC approves degree programme for FCE Yola
Summary: The National Universities Commission (NUC) granted approval to the Federal College of Education (FCE), Yola, to run degree programmes under the dual mandate arrangement . NUC approves degree programme for FCE Yola .

Title: Akpabio greets Nigerians at Christmas, urges peace, love, unity
Summary: Godswill Akpabio urges Nigerians to promote peace, love, and unity . President of the Senate congratulated Nigerians, particularly Christians, on the occasion of Christmas celebration . In his Christmas message, signed by his Special Adviser on Media and Publicity, Eseme Eyiboh,

Title: Troops foil kidnap attempt on Otukpo-Enugu highway, rescue 24 passengers
Summary: Troops foiled a kidnap attempt along the Otukpo-Enugu Expressway in Benue State . Troops of the Joint Task Force, Operation Whirl Stroke (OPWS) rescued 24 passengers .

Title: Borno Attack: Tinubu orders security agencies to intensify surveillance
Summary: Vice-President Kashim Shettima says the Federal Government is deploying additional tactical teams to the area attacked by terrorists in Maiduguri, to track down and apprehend those responsible . Tinubu orders security agencies to intensify surveillance .

Title: 7 ways Christmas has changed in Nigeria over the years
Summary: The Christmas season is here again, and as usual, it comes with the joyful celebration of tradition and togetherness . As usual, Christmas is celebrated with the joy of tradition, togetherness and tradition .

Title: Pastor Okafor warns VeryDarkMan to stop cyber attacks or risk legal action
Summary: Pastor Okafor warns VeryDarkMan to stop cyber attacks or risk legal action . Martins Vincent Otse, popularly known as VeryDark man, is a self-acclaimed activist . A young woman who introduced herself as Miss Chi, claiming to be OkaFor’s daughter, has also been accused of cyber attacks

Title: Maiduguri Mosque Bombing: Police deploy 1,000 officers to Borno
Summary: Police urge residents to continue their lawful activities but advised them to remain vigilant and security-conscious . The police spokesperson urged residents to stay vigilant .
